history.title: Our History
history.description: Since 2004, CECOM has been at the forefront of technology solutions in the Dominican Republic. What started as a small computer repair service has evolved into a comprehensive IT solutions provider, serving businesses across various industries with cutting-edge technology and unparalleled expertise.

timeline.title: Key Milestones
timeline.description: Major achievements that have shaped our journey and strengthened our position as a technology leader.

founded.title: Company Founded
founded.description: CECOM was established in Santo Domingo, starting with computer repair and basic IT services.

firstExpansion.title: Service Expansion
firstExpansion.description: Expanded into network infrastructure and enterprise solutions, serving medium and large businesses.

majorContract.title: Government Partnership
majorContract.description: Secured major contracts with government institutions, establishing credibility in the public sector.

modernization.title: Digital Transformation
modernization.description: Embraced cloud technologies and modern IT solutions, becoming a leader in digital transformation services.

achievements.title: Certifications & Achievements
achievements.description: Our commitment to excellence is reflected in our industry certifications and recognition from leading technology partners.
